thread.title: Tripping.com Announces Partnership with Only-apartments, Providing Even More Local Apartment Options
thread.title_full: Tripping.com Announces Partnership with Only-apartments, Providing Even More Local Apartment Options

author: Tripping.com
title: Tripping.com Announces Partnership with Only-apartments, Providing Even More Local Apartment Options
text: Receive press releases from Tripping.com: By Email RSS Feeds: Tripping.com Announces Partnership with Only-apartments, Providing Even More Local Apartment Options Tripping.com, the world's largest vacation rental search engine, has announced the addition of its newest partner, Barcelona-based apartment rental platform Only-apartments. Only-apartments will be the 26th partner to syndicate its listings with Tripping.com and joins the company's growing list of rental partners including Homeaway, VRBO, FlipKey, Roomorama, Booking.com and dozens more. San Francisco, CA, July 08, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Only-apartments adds around 30,000 listings to Tripping.com’s search inventory including apartments in top European destinations such as Porto, Nice, and GranadaTripping.com, the world's largest vacation rental search engine, has announced the addition of its newest partner, Barcelona-based apartment rental platform Only-apartments. Only-apartments will be the 26th partner to syndicate its listings with Tripping.com and joins the company's growing list of rental partners including Homeaway, VRBO, FlipKey, Roomorama, Booking.com and dozens more.Only-apartments is committed to offering guests the best prices and widest selection of apartment rentals for short and medium length stays. Only-apartments features properties in 109 countries across the world and the site offers an instant booking option as well as 24/7 customer service support. Tripping.com users can now search the Only-apartments inventory and book convenient and comfortable apartments in popular destinations worldwide.“Apartment vacation rentals are an ideal option for travelers who want an authentic experience, by staying in local neighborhoods,” said Tripping.com CEO Jen O’Neal. “Through our new partnership with Only-apartments, Tripping.com is pleased to offer our users an increased number of flats in Europe and around the world.”Only-apartments has made their entire inventory available to Tripping.com in order to attract international travelers who are seeking vacation rental apartments. With millions of visitors to the site each month, Tripping.com is able to help vacation rental brands expand their presence in over 170 countries worldwide.“Tripping.com has such an incredible reach among travellers, that this partnership will expand our brand awareness,” said Only-apartments founder and CEO, Alon Eldar. “With Tripping.com being the leader in vacation rental searching, we believe this partnership will introduce Only-apartments to new travellers around the world.”About Tripping.comHeadquartered in San Francisco, Tripping.com is the world's largest site for vacation homes and short-term rentals. With over 2.5 million properties spanning 100,000 destinations worldwide, Tripping.com makes it easy to compare vacation rentals from the world's top travel sites including HomeAway, FlipKey, VRBO, Booking.com and more. To find an amazing vacation rental that fits your budget and needs, visit www.tripping.com.About Only-apartmentsFounded in 2003, Only-apartments specializes in apartment rentals for short and medium stays. The company aims to offer the widest selection of apartments at a lower price than hotels. The Barcelona-based company currently lists over 30,000 apartments in 109 countries worldwide. At Only-apartments, booking is instant and efficient, making life easier both for travelers and property owners. Contact Information
